edu.macalester.turtle
Class TurtleSprite

java.lang.Object
  edu.macalester.turtle.TurtleSprite

public class TurtleSprite
extends java.lang.Object

A visual representation of a virtual turtle robot. A TurtleSprite's position and direction may differ from the state of the turtle it represents; this is useful for animating state changes. You can bring a sprite's state back into sync with the turtle's using sync().

Author:
Paul Cantrell

          Creates a sprite to represent the given turtle.
